verses.roman:
devāḥ sukarma-sutrāma-
saṁjñā indro divaspatiḥ
nirmoka-tattvadarśādyā
bhaviṣyanty ṛṣayas tadā

synonyms: devāḥ—the demigods; sukarma—the Sukarmās; sutrāma-saṁjñāḥ—and the Sutrāmas; indraḥ—the king of heaven; divaspatiḥ—Divaspati; nirmoka—Nirmoka; tattvadarśa-ādyāḥ—and others, like Tattvadarśa; bhaviṣyanti—will become; ṛṣayaḥ—the seven sages; tadā—at that time.
translation: In the thirteenth manvantara, the Sukarmās and Sutrāmas will be among the demigods, Divaspati will be the king of heaven, and Nirmoka and Tattvadarśa will be among the seven sages.
